tidbits.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Serbia boasts a rich cultural heritage, seen in its medieval monasteries like Studenica and the ancient city of Ni≈°, reflecting its diverse history.

tidbits.title: Rakija Tradition
tidbits.description: Rakija, a fruit brandy, holds significant cultural importance, often shared during gatherings and celebrations, representing Serbian hospitality.

tidbits.title: Exit Festival
tidbits.description: The Exit Festival in Novi Sad is one of Europe's biggest music festivals, attracting international artists and drawing crowds to its vibrant atmosphere.
